CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains Warm-up task to MOT . MOT gets a juice out of her bag for CHI who is watching INV
CHI faces MOT with her back to the camera
MOT gets something out of her bag
MOT throws something in the trash
CHI watches MOT while she drinks
CHI moves over to toys and picks up football
CHI picks up the football and hands it to MOT
CHI slowly turns and looks around the room
CHI points to waste basket and then looks at MOT
CHI has something in her other hand also
MOT points to toy in CHI's hand
CHI looks up at the desk
MOT turns to look where CHI is looking
CHI puts jack+in+the+box down on the floor in front of MOT
CHI pushes the clown down into the jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to push jack down
CHI looks up at MOT for help
CHI holds jack+in+the+box and holds it in front of MOT
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box from CHI
CHI bends down and picks up the toy duck on the floor
CHI hands MOT the toy duck
CHI picks up a book off of the floor and hands it to MOT
CHI holds car in hand and waves it in air then gives it to MOT
CHI looks all around the room
CHI walks over to a chair across the room
CHI pulls herself up on the chair and then goes across the room to a different chair
CHI looks up at MOT as she pats the chair
MOT is out of camera view
CHI looks up at the ceiling
CHI stands up and looks at the camera
CHI walks over to MOT and takes the toy car and then puts it on the floor
MOT holds out the other toys to CHI
CHI takes the toy duck from MOT
CHI drops the duck on the floor
<aft> CHI takes the jack+in+the+box from MOT
CHI pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at MOT for help
<$=4> MOT holds the jack+in+the+box for CHI
MOT holds jack for CHI to push down
MOT looks at CHI in a questioning manner
CHI plays with the lid of the jack+in+the+box and turns the handle
CHI stands back and looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI winds jack up and then pulls open the lid
<bef> CHI tries unsuccessfully to put the jack back into the box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box for CHI

g.ga: put the clown in the jack+in+the+box

u.a: CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes jack down into box but cannot close the lid
CHI looks to MOT for help
CHI pushes jack down into box
MOT holds down the clown with her thumb
CHI closes the lid of the box
CHI turns handle on jack while MOT holds down lid
CHI tries to close lid on jack but cannot keep it closed
CHI points to something on table
CHI takes a few steps back
CHI is standing on a cracker that was on the floor
CHI finishes juice and hands box to MOT
MOT takes empty juice container from CHI
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box and gives it to MOT to hold
INV leaves room at 09:15:34 while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 09:20:15 .
INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at table INV gives CHI three CHI from small activity to hold onto
INV puts the forbidden object on the table
INV sets the forbidden object into motion
CHI continues to reach for the object
CHI puts the other toys on the table
CHI gets out of the chair and looks for the toy she dropped on the floor
CHI watches INV put the object away
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction boxes INV picks up toys from Small Scale Activity . CHi is still sitting at the table
<aft> MOT lowers box so that CHI can look inside it
<aft> MOT holds box down for CHI to reach into
<aft> MOT takes out ball from box
MOT holds ball out to CHI
CHI looks up at MOT as she holds ball
MOT waves arm in direction of floor
CHI waves arm over to floor and the looks up at MOT
<aft> MOT walks over and sits on the floor
CHI sits near MOT on the floor
CHI rolls ball to MOT and then grabs the arm of the chair
MOT rolls ball over to CHI
CHI grabs ball and holds it
CHI points to objects near MOT and looks around the room
<bef> MOT crawls with fingers up to ball
CHI rolls the ball to MOT
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
MOT nods head and looks at CHI
CHI raises arm and points to door
MOT gestures to CHI to give her ball . <aft> MOT smiles
CHI plays with ball and then rolls it to MOT
MOT gets up off of the floor
MOT takes out the towel and hands it to CHI
CHI runs over to look at towel and reaches out for it
MOT holds out towel to CHI who takes it
CHI tries to put towel back in box
CHI points up at other boxes
MOT holds out towel to CHI
MOT puts the towel back in the box
MOT puts the other box on the desk
MOT brings the box over to the table and pulls out the chair
CHI scratches her head and watches MOT
MOT pulls the other chair over to the table
MOT opens the box on the table
CHI reaches for the contents of the box
MOT puts the crayons out on the paper
MOT sits in a chair behind CHI
CHI nods head towards chair and then turns back and looks at the table
MOT pulls out chair for CHI
MOT picks up CHI and puts her in chair
MOT leans closer to CHI and looks at her face
starts to cry and is distressed
CHI takes crayons from MOT and sets them on the table
CHI touches one of the crayons
CHI starts to draw with the crayon
CHI switches crayons and continues drawing
<bef> CHI switches colors again and then stops drawing
CHI pushes all the crayons off of the paper
<aft> MOT tries to take picture from CHI
CHI turns away and looks around
CHI points to wall behind her
<aft> MOT takes paper over to basket
MOT tries to put paper up
MOT is out of camera view
MOT puts the paper back in front of CHI
CHI looks at the back side of the paper briefly
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI looks questionly up at MOT's face
CHI starts to play with the crayons unenthusiastically
<6> MOT puts paper back in box
CHI puts crayons back in box
CHI puts the last crayon in the box
MOT opens the last box and puts it on the table
CHI reaches in box on table
CHI takes the book out of the box
MOT points to picture in book
CHI closes book and gives book back to MOT
MOT holds book open in front of CHI
MOT shows CHI holograph by tilting the book
CHI reaches for boxes on desk
MOT leans close to CHI and looks at CHI
CHI tries to get down from chair
CHI looks at the floor and then up at MOT
MOT gets up to get the ball
